about_the_game:
Ultimate Pain is an experience designed to challenge your spirit, your reflexes, and your ability to not throw your controller through the nearest wall. You will jump. You will fall. You will scream. But if you rise to the challenge, an unimaginably awesome reward awaits at the top.

Gameplay That Will Ruin Your Day (and You’ll Love It)

  • Jump with Purpose… and Fear
    Master the sacred art of jumping. A flawless leap is your only ally; gravity is your worst enemy. One mistake and you’ll plummet back to square one like a meteor of shame.

  • The Bottom Loves You
    Make friends with the starting line—it’s probably where you’ll spend most of your time. But hey, each fall is a learning opportunity, right? (Or so they say.)

  • Progress or Perish
    There’s no halfway. No checkpoints. No handholding. Just you, your courage, and a bottomless pit of regret waiting to embrace you.

Why Would You Do This to Yourself?

  • Feel the Agony, Chase the Ecstasy
    Every hard-earned inch upward is a triumph, every tumble downward a tragedy. It’s a poetic symphony of pain and persistence.

  • The Coolest Reward Ever™
    At the summit, the most epic, jaw-droppingly cool prize known to humankind awaits. What is it? You’ll have to survive UP to find out. (Spoiler: It’s worth it.)

  • High-Stakes Drama
    With each jump, you’ll hold your breath. With each fall, you’ll lose your mind. And with each climb back up, you’ll discover the indomitable spirit that defines you. Or… not.

Atmosphere Designed to Mock You

  • Graphics That’ll Make You Say “Why Am I Here?”
    Each level is meticulously crafted to be both beautiful and rage-inducing, a cruel joke wrapped in stunning art.

  • A Soundtrack to Soothe and Torment
    Relaxing melodies lull you into a false sense of security, only to leave you alone with the sound of your own despair.

  • A World Full of Sass and Secrets
    Marvel at the quirky obstacles and cryptic messages left behind to remind you that yes, this game is laughing at you.

Developer's Warning

Ultimate Pain is a game born from the twisted depths of inspiration from Getting Over It and Difficult game about climbing. It’s a love letter to suffering and an ode to perseverance. This is not for the weak, the impatient, or the sane. But for those who dare to climb, UP offers something few games can—a chance to achieve the impossible and come out the other side stronger (and possibly more unhinged).

Do You Have What It Takes?

Jump. Fall. Cry. Repeat. Ultimate Pain isn’t just a game; it’s your Everest. Now climb, you magnificent fool. Victory—or insanity—awaits.

name: Ultimate Pain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Ultimate Pain (UP) is wild, sock-blasting journey of non-stop jumping madness! We’re not sure if you’ll love it or scream in agony, but it’s packed with epic leaps, chaotic surprises, and gravity-defying pain. Get ready to jump UP, fall down, and laugh the whole way!
